item.title: Tweople's Top 10 Countdown wt Riversideboy - 23rd May 09 - Ep 03
item.description: Each week I, (Twitter ID:Riversideboy) ask my followers of twitter to send in their Top 5 songs on the charts via twitte DM or via a poll on my blog or via an email! These songs are later ranked depending on how popular they are among my followers of twitter and what we get is the "Tweople's Top 10" countdown! The chart is released on podcast every friday of the week as a week ending chart. The tracklisting is displayed on the blog http://riversideboy.wordpress.com under the "Tweople's Top 10" section, the following Monday! Hope you have fun listening in to my Countdown show! Send me a twitter message at riversideboy (Twitter ID) if you enjoyed listening to this countdown show! Cheers! Riversideboy
